alert.note: Alert for Adair; Guthrie; Madison (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 17 at 1:24AM CDT until July 17 at 2:15AM CDT by NWS DesMoines
info.description: The National Weather Service in Des Moines has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Madison County in south central Iowa... Southeastern Guthrie County in west central Iowa... Northeastern Adair County in southwestern Iowa... * Until 215 AM CDT. * At 124 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 7 miles southwest of Earlham, or 10 miles west of Winterset, moving southeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Winterset, Greenfield, Stuart, Avenue Of The Saints Event Center, St. Charles, Dexter, Truro, Patterson, East Peru, Macksburg, Greenfield Municipal Airport and Winterset-Madison County Airport. This includes Interstate 80 between mile markers 88 and 99. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
